DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety effectiveness p64 Flow Modulation Device .
DOC.brief_title: Diversion-p64 Post Market Clinical Follow-Up Study Assess Safety Effectiveness p64 Flow Modulation Device
DOC.detailed_description: Title : Diversion-p64 . Device : p64 Flow Modulation Device . Study design : Prospective , multicenter , single arm Post Market Clinical Follow-Up Study . Purpose : To assess safety effectiveness p64 . Study duration : 30 month . Sample Size : 107 patient . Number sit : 20 . Follow-up interval : 3-6 12 month clinical angiographic follow-up .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age â‰¥ 18 2 . Patient harbour either saccular dissecting blisterlike fusiform intracerebral aneurysm intracerebral segmental disease , anterior circulation indication p64 treatment give 3 . Patient legal representative provide write informed consent verify he/she consent use his/her data ( accord data protection law ) 1 . Aneurysms posterior circulation 2 . Imaging evidence bifurcation aneurysm 3 . Imaging evidence dissection 4 . Imaging evidence fistulae 5 . Imaging evidence arteriovenous malformation 6 . Patient harbour another aneurysm treat within six month first procedure 7 . Known allergy study medication , e.g . ASA , Clopidogrel , Heparin contrast medium 8 . Pregnant breast feed woman woman childbearing potential provide negative pregnancy test
